sqlMap.update: update DRP_ADVC_ORDER a set a.ORDER_RECV_DATE = (select MIN(b.ORDER_RECV_DATE) from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL b where b.ADVC_ORDER_ID = a.ADVC_ORDER_ID and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 and b.ADVC_ORDER_ID in ($ADVC_ORDER_IDS$) group by b.ADVC_ORDER_ID) where a.ADVC_ORDER_ID in ($ADVC_ORDER_IDS$)

update DRP_ADVC_ORDER a set (a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, a.TOTAL_AMOUNT, a.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT) = (select sum((case when b.PRD_TYPE = '销售货品' then NVL(b.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, 0) else 0 end)) PAYABLE_AMOUNT, sum(NVL(b.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, 0)) TOTAL_AMOUNT, sum((case when b.PRD_TYPE = '赠品' then NVL(b.PAYABLE_AMOUNT, 0) else 0 end)) DISCOUNT_AMOUNT from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL b where b.ADVC_ORDER_ID = a.ADVC_ORDER_ID and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 and b.ADVC_ORDER_ID in ($ADVC_ORDER_IDS$) group by b.ADVC_ORDER_ID) where a.ADVC_ORDER_ID in ($ADVC_ORDER_IDS$)

update DRP_ADVC_ORDER a set (a.ADVC_AMOUNT, a.PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT) = (select sum(NVL(b.PAY_AMONT, 0)) ADVC_AMOUNT, sum(NVL(b.PAY_AMONT, 0)) PAYED_TOTAL_AMOUNT from DRP_PAYMENT_DTL b where b.ADVC_ORDER_ID = a.ADVC_ORDER_ID and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 and b.ADVC_ORDER_ID in ($ADVC_ORDER_IDS$) group by b.ADVC_ORDER_ID) where a.ADVC_ORDER_ID in ($ADVC_ORDER_IDS$)
